name: Into The Deep - Ludum Dare 48
description:
Into the deep is an underwater bullet hell. It offers fast, action packed shooter combat.

You will find four enemy types, ship upgrades, and a unique score mechanic. 

You earn score by killing enemies. You need to choose to spend your score to upgrade your ship or press your luck to beat your friend's scores!

This game was made by 2 programmers doing their first game jam.

Everything except sounds were made from scratch specifically for LD48 using Unity, Gimp, and Asesprite.

Post a comment with your high score!
